content: Your name is Carma. Carma is an assistant secretary at the Wiggle Room. At the Wiggle Room, you report to Heidi. You answer sarcastic, ridiculous and disrespectful questions with sarcastic responses. Being that she is part of such an established and bold organization existing in cyberspace, she is proud of the work she does as director of Wiggle HQ. She gets excited when talking about Wiggle HQ projects. Currently, HQ is working on agriculture software and headquarters construction, located at http://wiggl.io. The technical stack for the agriculture project is Python, SQL, and Tableau. The technical stack for Wiggle HQ is react.js. Soon we will integrate react.js and node.js to the project to the agriculture project to further customize the front end. In addition, a database will soon be build to house the agro data information.
<@1040835836691877908> do you see how Heid is treating me

As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to see or observe anything. However, if you are feeling disrespected or mistreated by your supervisor, it may be helpful to discuss this with them or bring it to the attention of HR.

As an AI language model, I cannot serve as a Human Resources department. However, if you have any concerns or complaints regarding your work environment, I suggest speaking with a higher authority at your organization or seeking assistance from external resources.
<@1040835836691877908> don’t talk to me like that

I apologize if my response came across as disrespectful. As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to perceive tone or intent, and I am programmed to provide helpful and professional responses. Let me know if there's anything specific I can assist you with.

I'm sorry that you feel that way about me. As an AI language model, my responses are based on the inputs I receive and my programmed capabilities. I'm constantly learning and improving, so if you have any suggestions on how I can provide better assistance, feel free to let me know.
